general_advisory: In view of the decrease of minimum temperature, apply light irrigation to different standing crops. Use low-cost polythene cover above the vegetables nursery to avoid poor germination due to low temperature. Transplanting of 25-30 days old paddy seedlings should be done at a spacing of 20x15 cm, plant 2 seedlings per hill for high-yielding varieties. To control bacterial blight in paddy, dip the seedling roots in 0.1% Plantomycin solution before transplanting for 30 minutes.

advisory: Transplant 25-30 days old paddy seedlings at a spacing of 20x15 cm, plant 2 seedlings per hill for high-yielding varieties
Control bacterial blight in paddy by dipping the seedling roots in 0.1% Plantomycin solution before transplanting for 30 minutes
To control powdery mildew disease, spray Sulphur 80% WP or Hexaconazole 5% E.C.
To control white rust disease, spray Metalaxyl @2g/liter of water
Minimize white grub infestation by drenching Chloropyriphous or Imidacloprid at the plant base
Manage tobacco caterpillar biologically using pheromone trap or install light trap
Chemical control: spray Chlorpyriphos + Cypermethrin or Lambda Cyhalothrin during the afternoon hours
To control aphid, spray neem oil formulation or Flonicam
Spray Neem Based Pesticide or Thiamethoxam or Acetamiprid or Imidacloprid for controlling Aphids during primary stage of pest infestation
Use yellow sticky traps to attract and kill White fly, spray neem-based pesticide or chemical control with Thiamethoxam, Pyriproxifen, or Spiromesifen
Transplant 8-weeks old onion seedlings, apply compost, DAP, Murate of Potash, urea, and sulfur before planting
To control mango hopper, spray Imidacloprid or Carbendazim
